property.name: headline
property.label: Headline
property.description: Provides a snapshot of the content combined with a URL the card leads to in Markdown link format.

property.name: copy
property.label: Copy
property.description: Provides further details where the headline alone may not be sufficient - in Markdown format.
property.default: Use content cards to display all or larger group of content options to your users.

property.name: footer
property.label: Footer
property.description: Provides further context separated from the copy by a horizontal ruler - in Markdown format.

property.name: date
property.label: Date
property.description: Specifies a date context for the content, e.g. a publication date - in ISO8601 format.

property.name: image
property.label: Image source
property.description: Allows for different content to stand out and provide additional context - as an URL.

property.name: imageAlt
property.label: Image alt
property.description: Specifies an alternate text for the image, if the image cannot be displayed.

property.name: tag
property.label: Tag
property.description: Indicates the category of a topic or theme to further group content.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
